text:
RHS Weekly Announcements 10/14
GENERAL SCHOOL ANNOUNCEMENTS
LIBRARY:Click herefor library hours!
THRIFT STORE:Terrier Town Thrift is reopening! Now in R-2, Everything still $1. Fridays 10/4, 10/11, 11/8, 11/22, 12/6 and 12/13 at lunch. See the flyer on Minga. Don't have $1 and need something? Ask your counselor how to shop for free.
ACTIVITIES, ATHLETICS, & CLUBS
MUSIC CONCERT;The Fall Music Concert is on 10/16 Clock Auditorium at 6:30PM. All RHS students are free with their MINGA ID and will receive Blue Crew Points for attending. Come and support our music program!
ART SHOW SUBMISSIONS:The Art Department is excited to announce our upcoming art show,Spooky Art Show, scheduled to take placeOctober 28th-31st. This event aims to celebrate and showcase the creativity and talent of artists like you. We are now accepting submissions and would like to invite you to participate by sharing your artwork for consideration. Whether you specialize in painting, sculpture, photography, or any other medium, we welcome diverse forms of artistic expression.This is a fantastic opportunity to share your art with a wider audience and connect with fellow artists and art enthusiasts.
Submission Details:
Submission Deadline: Now -October 18th
Artwork Requirements: Art must be appropriate
How to Submit: Bring your art to one of the Art teachers in the S-Wing (S-1, 3, 4, or 5)
FUTURESPIRITLEADERSCLINIC:Calling all future spirit leaders ages TK - 8th Grade! Want to learn how to cheer and be part of the RHS halftime show? Sign up for our Future Spiritleader Clinic! The training clinic is onOct. 14, 4-7PMat Terrier Hall and the performance at the game on10/18. $50 Day of registration includes game entrance, bow, shirt, snack and coaching.
CLUBS:
COMPACT CLUB:MEETINGS Fall Semester Dates:10/15, 10/29, 11/12, 12/3 in room 451 at lunch
ATHLETICS:
HOME GAMES: ALL RHS Students get in FREE to league games with their ID through the LCAP ASB Funding!
ClickHEREto view this monthâ€™s schedule.
ClickHEREto purchase athletics tickets.
GIRLS WATER POLO:Try Girls Water Polo! Meet us at the pool deck this Monday 6:30-8:30AM, Wednesday & Friday 6-7:30AM and follow us on Instagram at@rhsgwp
BOYS SOCCER:RHS Boys Soccer will have tryouts on10/21/24-10/25/24 from 4-5:30 pmon the South campus JV baseball field. Players must be cleared through the Athletics Office to participate. Please email coachmario.marquez@gmail.com with any questions.
JOIN WRESTLING:Come to preseason practice and see if wrestling is the sport for you! Preseason Practices are going on nowM-F, 4PM-6PMin the wrestling room (RM 72). We welcome all boys & girls of all abilities! Join us anytime after you are cleared through the RHS Athletic Department. Hope to see you there! Go Terriers! ğŸ¾ Stay up to date with all Wrestling updates by following them onINSTAGRAM.
BLUE CREW EVENTSCALENDAR:
What areBlue CrewEvents? Advertised Blue Crew Events are where students earn Blue Crew Points for attending. Make sure you get your ID scanned to get your points! Points can be entered to win prizes at the end of the year!
